analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/6/0x8bf82372f60100399dc633581ef4a40366a98750.sol#120-121) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/6/0x8bf82372f60100399dc633581ef4a40366a98750.sol#218-254)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/6/0x8bf82372f60100399dc633581ef4a40366a98750.sol#334-356)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x8bf82372f60100399dc633581ef4a40366a98750.sol#427-442)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x8bf82372f60100399dc633581ef4a40366a98750.sol#446-463)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/6/0x8bf82372f60100399dc633581ef4a40366a98750.sol#527-531) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/6/0x8bf82372f60100399dc633581ef4a40366a98750.sol#267-285):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/6/0x8bf82372f60100399dc633581ef4a40366a98750.sol#282-283)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/6/0x8bf82372f60100399dc633581ef4a40366a98750.sol#284)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x8bf82372f60100399dc633581ef4a40366a98750.sol#558-573) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/6/0x8bf82372f60100399dc633581ef4a40366a98750.sol#570-573)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/6/0x8bf82372f60100399dc633581ef4a40366a98750.sol#494) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/6/0x8bf82372f60100399dc633581ef4a40366a98750.sol#535-538)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/6/0x8bf82372f60100399dc633581ef4a40366a98750.sol#527-531)
	- /unique_chucks/6/0x8bf82372f60100399dc633581ef4a40366a98750.sol#529-531
MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x8bf82372f60100399dc633581ef4a40366a98750.sol#92)
